messages.msgSnippet: Hi Barb, thanks for answering. I clicked on your links and it tells me that I m not a moderator for the group. No files link appears. I m not sure what I m
messages.messageBody:
Hi Barb, thanks for answering.

I clicked on your links and it tells me that I'm not a moderator for the group. No files link appears. I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong. I thought I was signed in.

Color me confused,
Pen

got the notice.

yahoogroups?

messages.subject: Help!
messages.msgSnippet: Can someone tell me why I don t have files listed as one of the features on the left side of the page? Where would fan fiction be located if not there? I d
messages.messageBody:
Can someone tell me why I don't have "files" listed as one of the features on the left side of the page? Where would fan fiction be located if not there? I'd like to read and post but the instructions on the home page don't seem to apply.

Thanks,
Pen
